apps.localizedDescription: Hello Kitty Island Adventure takes place on an island inhabited by Sanrio characters. The gameplay involves adventuring and puzzle solving, with new areas being added regularly.
apps.name: Hello Kitty Island Adventure
apps.subtitle: Island adventures await
apps.versionDescription: It’s time for the biggest event of the year! It’s hello kittys 50th birthday and she can’t wait for you to see her show stopping celebration

apps.localizedDescription: Bloons TD 6 is a 2018 tower defense game developed and published by Ninja Kiwi, where various monkeys pop "bloons".
apps.name: Bloons TD 6+
apps.subtitle: Mega Popular Tower Defense.
apps.versionDescription: Too much to type on phone

apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore allows you to install Delta as well as any app (.ipa) directly from the Files app.
apps.name: NBA 2K25: Arcade Edition
apps.subtitle: Run the neighbourhood

apps.localizedDescription: Crossy Road Castle is a retro-style platform video game that was developed and published by Hipster Whale for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, and later, visionOS. It is a spin-off of Crossy Road, a retro-style endless runner game.
apps.name: Crossy Road Castle
apps.subtitle: Endless co-op action fun
apps.versionDescription: - Challenge Events bug fixes and improvements
